__TOC__

A category is a WikiName that exploits <nowiki>[[Wiki:WikiWiki|WikiWiki]]</nowiki>'s reverse linking: if you click on the title of a category page, you'll get a list of pages belonging to that category. To get a list of all categories, click the Category''''''Category title in the navigation area.

Additionally, you can use <nowiki>[[HelpOnMacros|macros]]</nowiki> to add automatically generated lists of all pages which are members of that particular category to the category page.
